4300010.name: Pick 'N Punch: The Broken World
4300010.description:
Once, a hero changed the world.
Now, only the ruins remember.

Pick 'N Punch is a challenging 2D physics-based platformer where every movement matters. You control a fallen hero, navigating treacherous environments using precise grabs, momentum, and raw persistence.

The world is frickin' weird!

As you climb, fall, and climb again, fragments of a forgotten story unfold through environments, subtle dialogue, and moments of quiet reflection. The game speaks directly to the player, blurring the line between character and controller.

Expect:

  • Punishing but fair gameplay inspired by rage platformers

  • Physics-driven movement where mistakes are costly, and progress is earned

  • Minimalist visuals with a strong atmosphere and mood

  • Environmental storytelling that rewards attention

  • A journey about your failure, memory, and breaking keyboards

    No mercy.
    Only the climb.
